name: QR
summary: Simple QR helpers with fluent and static APIs.
remarks: Use CodeGlyphX.QR.Save(System.String,System.String,CodeGlyphX.QrEasyOptions,System.String) to pick the output format by file extension.

members.name: Create
members.summary: Starts a fluent QR builder for plain text.
members.signature: static QR.QrBuilder Create(string payload, QrEasyOptions options)

members.name: Create
members.summary: Starts a fluent QR builder for a payload with embedded defaults.
members.signature: static QR.QrBuilder Create(QrPayloadData payload, QrEasyOptions options)

members.name: Encode
members.summary: Encodes a payload into a QR code.
members.signature: static QrCode Encode(string payload, QrEasyOptions options)

members.name: EncodeAuto
members.summary: Detects a payload type and encodes it into a QR code.
members.signature: static QrCode EncodeAuto(string payload, QrPayloadDetectOptions detectOptions, QrEasyOptions options)

members.name: Encode
members.summary: Encodes a payload with embedded defaults into a QR code.
members.signature: static QrCode Encode(QrPayloadData payload, QrEasyOptions options)

members.name: TryDecodeAllImage
members.summary: Attempts to decode all QR codes from an image stream (PNG/BMP/PPM/PBM/PGM/PAM/XBM/XPM/TGA).
members.signature: static bool TryDecodeAllImage(Stream stream, out QrDecoded[] decoded)

members.name: TryDecodeAllImage
members.summary: Attempts to decode all QR codes from an image stream (PNG/BMP/PPM/PBM/PGM/PAM/XBM/XPM/TGA) with options.

members.name: Save
members.summary:
Saves a QR code to a file based on the file extension (.png/.svg/.svgz/.html/.jpg/.bmp/.ppm/.pbm/.pgm/.pam/.xbm/.xpm/.tga/.ico/.pdf/.eps).
 Defaults to PNG when no extension is provided.
members.signature: static string Save(string payload, string path, QrEasyOptions options, string title)

members.name: SaveAuto
members.summary:
Detects a payload type and saves a QR code to a file based on the file extension (.png/.svg/.svgz/.html/.jpg/.bmp/.ppm/.pbm/.pgm/.pam/.xbm/.xpm/.tga/.ico/.pdf/.eps).
 Defaults to PNG when no extension is provided.
members.signature: static string SaveAuto(string payload, string path, QrPayloadDetectOptions detectOptions, QrEasyOptions options, string title)

members.name: Save
members.summary:
Saves a QR code to a file based on the file extension (.png/.svg/.svgz/.html/.jpg/.bmp/.ppm/.pbm/.pgm/.pam/.xbm/.xpm/.tga/.ico/.pdf/.eps).
 Defaults to PNG when no extension is provided.
members.signature: static string Save(QrPayloadData payload, string path, QrEasyOptions options, string title)
